Cell fraction deconvolution by DeSide or Scaden.

deside.decon_cf.dnn_evaluation(model_name, true_cell_fraction_file_path, result_dir_prediction, model_dir, result_dir, bulk_exp_file_path: str, test_set_name: str, replace=False, font_scale=1.5)Â¶

Model performance evaluation for test set

Parameters

  • model_name â model name

  • true_cell_fraction_file_path â file path of true (ground truth) cell fraction

  • result_dir_prediction â result directory contains the file of predicted cell fraction by DNN model

  • model_dir â pre-trained DNN model

  • result_dir â where to save the results

  • bulk_exp_file_path â the file path of bulk cell, log2(CPM + 1), sample by gene

  • test_set_name â the name of Test set, mark x / y label when plotting

  • replace â if replace previous result

  • font_scale â scale font size

Returns

deside.decon_cf.dnn_prediction(model_name, model_dir, cancer_type, bulk_exp_fp, result_dir, exp_type='TPM')Â¶

Predict cell fractions of each cell type by pre-trained DNN model, single model and single cancer type

Parameters

  • model_name â DeSide or Scaden

  • model_dir â model directory of pre-trained DNN model

  • cancer_type â cancer type for naming

  • bulk_exp_fp â file path of bulk expression profile file for corresponding cancer_type, gene by sample

  • result_dir â where to save the predicted results

  • exp_type â TPM (transcript per million) or log2tpm1p, log2(TPM + 1)

Returns

Parameters

  • h5ad_file_path â file path of simulated bulk expression profiles saved in .h5ad file
